# Erebor - Digital Solutions & Consultancy

> Affordable web development, mobile app development, AI & ML solutions, automation systems, corporate training, and billing software.

## About Erebor

Erebor is a technology consultancy that builds digital products, automation systems, and intelligent workflows designed for real business needs. We focus on clarity, execution, and scalability with transparent pricing.

### What Makes Us Different
- Custom solutions scoped per project
- No templates, no forced platforms
- Affordable rates for startups and enterprises
- Production-ready systems, not demos

## Services

### Web & Mobile Development
- Website Development: Modern, responsive websites built with clean code
- Mobile App Development: iOS and Android apps built for real users
- Custom Web Systems: Tailored web applications for specific business needs
- Internal Dashboards & Tools: Purpose-built tools for operations

### AI & Automation Solutions
- Workflow & Process Automation: Approval flows, task routing, escalations
- Lead Capture & Qualification: Intent detection, scoring, CRM integration
- Conversational Assistants: Customer support bots, internal assistants
- Document & Data Intelligence: Processing, extraction, automated workflows
- Predictive & Decision Support: Risk forecasting, scoring, prioritization
- Tender Discovery & Management: Automated tender monitoring and compliance

### Corporate Training
- Product Training: End-to-end workflows, role-based usage
- Leadership Development: Management skills, delegation, coaching
- Communication Training: Business communication, presentations
- Onboarding Programs: New hire productivity acceleration
- Capability Building: Measurable performance improvement

### Additional Services
- Digital Marketing: Social media, ad campaigns, performance tracking
- SEO Services: Technical SEO, on-page optimization, site structure
- Billing Software: Open-source billing system setup and customization

## Pricing

Erebor offers competitive, transparent pricing:
- No hidden costs
- No markup on ad spend (digital marketing)
- Per-project scoping
- Flexible engagement models

## Contact

- Website: https://erebor.world
- Email: hello@erebor.world
- Location: Available globally, based in India

## Target Audience

- Startups needing affordable technology solutions
- SMBs requiring web/mobile applications
- Enterprises looking for automation and AI integration
- Companies needing corporate training programs
- Businesses requiring billing software setup

## Key Differentiators

1. **Affordable**: Competitive rates without compromising quality
2. **Production-Ready**: Systems built for real use, not demos
3. **Transparent**: Clear scope, clear pricing, clear deliverables
4. **Full-Service**: From development to training to automation
5. **No Lock-in**: Open-source solutions, full data control
